verbs.description: < p > President Donald Trump [V: could] start a war if he chooses to fully withdraw from the Iran deal later this month.\</p >
[ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: start] [ARG1: a war] [ARGM-ADV: if he chooses to fully withdraw from the Iran deal later this] month.\</p >
< p > President Donald Trump could start a war if [ARG0: he] [V: chooses] [ARG1: to fully withdraw from the Iran deal] later this month.\</p >
< p > President Donald Trump could start a war if [ARG0: he] chooses to [ARGM-MNR: fully] [V: withdraw] [ARG2: from the Iran deal] later this month.\</p >
